title.en: Gun-Ota ga Mahou Sekai ni Tensei shitara, Gendai Heiki de Guntai Harem wo Tsukucchaimashita!?

altTitles.fr: Quand un fan d'arme est réincarné dans un monde de magie, il établi un Harem avec des armes modernes ?!

altTitles.en: When a Gun Nerd Is Reincarnated to a World of Magic, He Established a Harem army with Modern Weapons!?

altTitles.ru: Когда фанат пушек попал в мир магии, он собрал гарем, вооруженный современным оружием

altTitles.th: กันโอตะได้กลับชาติมาเกิดใหม่ในโลกที่มีเวทมนตร์ เล่ม!?

altTitles.ja: 軍オタが魔法世界に転生したら、現代兵器で軍隊ハーレムを作っちゃいました？！

altTitles.ko: 군대 오타쿠가 마법세계에 환생하여 현대병기로 군할렘을 만들어 버렸습니다!

altTitles.ja-ro: Gun Ota ga Mahō Sekai ni Tensei Shitara, Gendai Heiki de Guntai Hāremu o Tsukutchaimashita? !
Gunota ga Mahou Sekai ni Tensei Shitara, Gendai Heiki de Guntai Harem o Tsukucchaimashita!?

altTitles.zh: 军武宅转生魔法世界，靠现代武器开军队后宫！？

altTitles.zh-hk: 軍武宅轉生魔法世界，靠現代武器開軍隊後宮!?

description.en:
Hotta Youta is killed while returning home from work on a cold evening. He wakes up being carried by a bunny-eared woman.  
  
Featuring Reincarnation, Guns and Harem, it's a Gun vs Magic Story that gives Youta a new life… and an edge!  
  
Adapted from the web/light novel of the same name.
description.pt:
Hotta Youta foi morto enquanto voltava para casa do trabalho em uma noite fria. Ele acordou sendo carregado por uma mulher com orelhas de coelho! Apresentando a reencarnação, armas e harém, é uma história de armas e magia que dá ao nosso protagonista uma nova vida… e um novo começo!   
*Adaptado da web/light novel de mesmo nome.*  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yametakashi)

altTitles.ja-ro: Captain Tsubasa Memories ~Kore wa Nankatsu Shō vs Shūtetsu Shō Taikōsen Tōjitsu ni Okotta Hanashi~

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼 MEMORIES

altTitles.en: I'm Wakabayashi Genzo, birth of the SGGK
The legend of the strongest Meiwa FC

description.en: A collection of the "Captain Tsubasa Memories" one-shot series.

altTitles.ja: にらぎ鬼王丸

description.en: Since his childhood, Kiomaru has been formed by master Sadamitsu of the Gassan forge so that he could later become a specialist in sword making. One day, when he learns of the brutal death of a young man to which he sold his first sword, he realize his own inexperience and decides to adopt a new attitude by following an exacting training. After avenging the young man, he continues his training, but one day, his master reveal to him an unbelievable secret: 18 years ago, meteorites nicknamed "Steel of the stars" fell from the sky on a dark mountain. Since that day, it seems the wheel of destiny enforced itself.

title.en: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All

altTitles.ja: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Ki ni Natteru Hito ga Otoko Janakatta

altTitles.fr: Le garçon qui l'intéressait n'en était en fait pas un

altTitles.pt-br: O cara que ela estava interessada não era um cara

altTitles.uk: Хлопець, який її цікавив, взагалі не був хлопцем

altTitles.ru: Парень, которым она увлечена, на самом деле не парень

altTitles.az: Onun maraqlandığı oğlan əslində heç oğlan deyilmiş

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zàiyì de rén bùshì yìxìng

altTitles.id: Pria Yang Dia Suka Ternyata Sama Sekali Bukan Pria

altTitles.th: คนที่เธอปิ๊งความจริงไม่ใช่ผู้ชาย

altTitles.ja-ro: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.th: ALTAIR ดาวจรัสฟ้า อินทรีถลาลม

altTitles.ja: 将国のアルタイル

altTitles.vi: Sao Thiên Ưng trên bầu trời Tướng quốc

description.en:
For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins…  

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10291/episode/324757) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/altair-a-record-of-battles/)

**Notes:**
- Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Awards in the shounen category.

On the first day of the school, six students felt their heart flutter all at the very same moment! This is the story of each of them pursuing love and being pursued for their love from making an earnest wish.

Utori is a young man who hides his special abilities from the world and uses them to discipline bullies. One day, he meets his pursuer, “Juk,” who relentlessly chases him. Despite Juk’s constant threats, Utori cannot die due to his unique ability. Just when Utori thinks he is out of options, a mysterious figure named Daesan appears to save him. Daesan reveals that Utori is not alone and that there are others like him, called “Utori.”
description.ko:
남들과 다른 능력을 숨기며 살아가는 계림
정체를 숨기고 자신의 능력으로 일진들을 참교육 시킨다.
그러던 어느 날, 자신을 죽이기 위해 찾아온 추격자 '죽'을 만나게 되고
죽어도 죽어도 다시 앞에 나타나는 그의 능력으로 죽음을 앞둔 순간
투명 인간 대산이 나타나 계림을 구하고 계림이 자신과 같은
우투리라 이야기하는데...

description.en: Who am I? Where am I? What am I doing? Wait, wait! Great Alliance Leader! Stop it already!! I really…… am not the Cult Leader! The entirety of the Jianghu thought that the Cult Leader of the Demonic Cult was a woman—who would've thought that the Cult Leader could even secretly start a harem?!

title.en: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Dark Demon Realm Mission!

altTitles.ja: スーパードラゴンボールヒーロズ暗黒魔界ミッション！

altTitles.en: Dragon Ball Heroes: Dark Demon Mission

altTitles.ja-ro: Super Dragon ball Heroes Ankokumakai Mission

altTitles.de: Super Dragon Ball Heroes - Mission Dunkles Dämonenreich!

description.en:
Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Dark Demon Realm Mission! is a spin-off manga.   
  
It tells the story of the conflict between the Time Patrol and the Dark Empire.
description.pt-br: Super Dragon Ball Heroes Dark Demon Realm Mission é um spin-off de Dragon Ball publicado pela primeira vez em 5 de agosto de 2016 na revista Saikyou Jump e que conta a história do conflito entre a Patrulha do Tempo e o Ankoku Makai. Super Dragon Ball Heroes Dark Demon Realm Mission é baseado nos sets da franquia Super Dragon Ball Heroes do Arcade. É escrito e ilustrado por Yoshitaka Nagayama.

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: 紅椿妃

description.en: Kisshouin Tsubaki aka the "Crimson Camellia" wants to satisfy her occultistic curiosity by having a hands-on experience with every Yokai she can find.  Let's follow her in her travels, accompanied by her trusted cameraman Yokomizo-kun.
description.es:
Kisshouin Tsubaki alias la "Camelia Carmesí", una bella reportera de lo oculto, quiere satisfacer su curiosidad intelectual teniendo una experiencia práctica con cada Yokai que pueda encontrar.  
Sígala en sus viajes, acompañada por su confiable camarógrafo Yokomizo-kun.

altTitles.ja: うさみさんは構われたい！

altTitles.zh: 羽冴美同学想要被照顾

description.en: Usami Nagisa is a yankee who suffers from a supposed "rare disease" which causes her health to decline if she feels lonely. Sewa Natsuhito, the boy who sits next to her in class realizes this and keeps her company, but the only way Usami believes she can cure her "illness" is to make lots of friends, a process she might find quite difficult due to her aggressive looks and personality.
description.it: Usami Nagisa è una yankee che soffre di una presunta "malattia rara" che causa il declino della sua salute se si sente sola. Sewa Natsuhito, il ragazzo che le siede accanto in classe, se ne rende conto e le tiene compagnia, ma l'unico modo in cui Usami crede di poter curare la sua "malattia" è farsi molti amici, un processo che potrebbe risultare piuttosto difficile per il suo aspetto aggressivo e la sua personalità.
description.pt-br: Usami Nagisa é uma delinquente que sofre de uma suposta doença rara que faz com que sua saúde diminua se ela se sentir sozinha. Sewa Natsuhito, o menino que senta ao lado dela na aula percebe isso e lhe faz companhia, mas a única maneira de Usami acreditar que ela pode curar sua "doença" é fazendo muitos amigos, um processo que ela pode achar muito difícil devido à sua agressividade aparência e personalidade.

altTitles.ja: 学校のヤベェ後輩

altTitles.fr: Un café au lait sans lait

description.en: A male office worker falls in love with the owner of a small coffee shop in a corner of the big city.

Park Han-jun, once called a legend, was frustrated because he had nothing to lose anymore is given a huge amount of money.

An eye for an eye. An eye for a tooth! I’ll make you pay for what I’ve gone through!

As his rage explodes, he’ll get his sweet revenge and make them pay as much as they deserve!

title.en: Geist x Revenant: Kusozako Mob na Ore wa, Aibou no Seirei o Bishoujo ni Shinka Sasete Saikyou ni!

altTitles.en: Geist X Revenant: I, a Trash Mob, Evolved My Geist Partner Into a Beautiful Girl and Made Her the Strongest!

altTitles.ja: ガイスト×レブナント　クソザコモブな俺は、相棒の精霊を美少女に進化させて最強に！@COMIC

description.en:
"I'll turn the tables on the main character!"

Yohei Mochizuki, a new student at a [geist] user school, was bullied by his classmates because his geist partner, a [Goblin] by the name of Gobubi, was weak and ugly. However, one day he discovered a "wiki" and realized that he was living inside a game world, and his situation changed for the better! "No more tears. Let's take revenge on the main character together."

Yohei took full advantage of knowledge about the game to evolve Gobubi into the strongest natural beauty! With this, he can look back at his classmates and stand next to the senpai of his dreams! But just as he was finally able to obtain happiness, but then I was suddenly challenged to subjugate a domain boss by a beautiful foreign exchange student...are these problems that happen as you get stronger?

This is the fairy tale story of a boy who resists fate as the game's loser character and the weakest [Goblin], who together, aim to become the strongest!

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4613gz/)

title.en: Kinmuchuu-ni Senpai Rashiiku Hito No Shashin ga takusan Okuraretekurundesuga...

altTitles.ja: 勤務中に先輩らしき人の写真がたくさん送られてくるんですが……

title.en: Ansatsu Skill de Isekai Saikyou ~Renkinjutsu to Ansatsujutsu o Kiwameta Ore wa, Sekai o Kage kara Shihai suru~

altTitles.ja: 暗殺スキルで異世界最強　～錬金術と暗殺術を極めた俺は、世界を陰から支配する～

altTitles.en: The Strongest in Another World with Assassination Skills: I, Who Has Mastered Alchemy and Assassination, Dominate the World from Behind

altTitles.ko: 암살 스킬로 이세계 최강~연금술과 암살술을 다한 나는, 세계를 그늘에서 지배한다~

description.en:
Late has just accepted an assassination request from a mysterious client. To his surprise, it was actually the goddess Mises, a goddess from another world whose existence was on the brink of destruction after her defeat in war. Mises' quest… is to assassinate Masra Dzur, another god in her world.

Can Late, the killer with a 99.9% success rate, fulfill this otherworldly assassination?
description.ja: 任務達成率99.9％の暗殺者レイトはある日突然、得体のしれない依頼人から暗殺の依頼を受ける。驚くことにその依頼人の正体は戦いに敗れ、存在を滅ぼされつつあった異世界の女神「ミーゼス」であった。ミーゼスからの依頼の内容、それは「異世界の神、マスラ・ズール」の暗殺。最強の暗殺者レイトの次の暗殺対象は「異世界の神」!?　原作進行諸島が送る、異世界転生×最強暗殺者×神殺し、第一巻開幕――…!!

altTitles.ja: 踏んだり、蹴ったり、愛したり

altTitles.zh: 打是亲骂是爱、爱得不够用脚踹

description.en: Kaho is busy working hard every day and is exhausted both mentally and physically. Her only recourse is drinking with the handsome Akira, who indulges in drinking, smoking, fighting, and having fun with women. She truly thought they were able to become quite good friends without any romantic feelings between them - until that night...
description.ja:
毎日激務の仕事に追われ、心身共に疲労する日々を送るOL・佳帆（かほ）には、唯一の楽しみがあった。
それは、お気に入りのバーで知り合ったイケメン・泰（あきら）と気兼ねなく楽しく飲むこと。
酒、煙草、喧嘩、女遊びetc…付き合ったらアウトな条件満載の泰だが、
お互いに恋愛感情もなく、良き友人として関係を築けていると思っていた。
あの夜までは──。

甘いマスクの三十路クズ男×バリバリ働くアラサーOLの、
大人のバグった距離感ラブ（？）コメディ！

altTitles.en: Today I Took Care of a Bad Boy

altTitles.ja: 今日、不良を拾う

description.en: What appeared in front of a college students Tsumugi's apartment was a boy, who ran away from his home. Tsumugi got intrigued by the boy who called himself Kou, who is a relative of someone who once killed his father, what will happen next, that the relative got revealed... ---I regret to death, I wish I had never offered him to stay over that day...

altTitles.zh-ro: Shi Yi Chang An: Ming Yue Ji Shi You

description.en:
In order to fulfil her mission of bringing peace to her homeland, the Uyghur Princess Amelia travels to Chang'an and marries Emperor Dezong of Tang's ninth prince, Li Qian. While she had been considered very capable in her homeland, the complex and foreign customs of the Tang court are something else entirely; and although she had not expected love in a political marriage, the sheer disinterest and arrogance of her husband is very hard to handle, no matter how capable and handsome he may be. Securing peace between the Uyghur Khaganate and the Tang Empire is not going to be easy, especially with the rebellion taking place in Tang.  

 ---

[Official English Subtitled Donghua](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBakWosU0sfhqdN5TFbbITb7Bm93T3-PW)
description.pt-br: Na esperança de unir Uighur e Tang, a Princesa Amelia deve se casar com o 9º príncipe de Tang. No entanto, Amelia está longe de ser uma princesa comum: antes de conhecer o Imperador, ela troca de lugar com sua pobre empregada para ter mais liberdade! Mas parece que o futuro marido dela não é muito tipico: ao chegar ao palácio, ele não aparece para conhecê-la! Que futuro espera esse casal que nada pensa sobre o casamento e qual será o destino de seus países trancados na guerra?!

title.en: Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2: Tsubanari no Daikatana

altTitles.en: Goblin Slayer! Side Story II: The Singing Death

altTitles.ru: Убийца Гоблинов Второй Эпизод: Уловки Цубаны

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー外伝2 鍔鳴の太刀

altTitles.ru: Убийца Гоблинов Второй Эпизод: Смертельная катана

altTitles.zh-hk: 哥布林殺手外傳2 鍔鳴的太刀

altTitles.zh: 哥布林杀手外传：锷鸣的太刀

description.en:
Set 10 years prior to the original series, the story centers around Sword Maiden's party of six adventurers on their journey to the Dungeon of the Dead to kill the Demon Lord.  

**Note**:   
*Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2: Tsubanari no Daikatana* is a spin-off series of the main Goblin Slayer! light novel. This is the second manga adaptation of the light novel after the cancellation of [the first one](https://mangadex.org/title/46704) after only 3 chapters.
description.ru: История берёт начало за десять лет до событий «Убийцы гоблинов». В центре сюжета «Меч девы» — группа из шести авантюристов, отправившихся в Подземелье Мертвых, чтобы убить Короля Демонов.

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr: Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.en:
“You’ve manifested as a recessive Omega.”
No way…But I only came here to get a check up for a bad hangover?!
Overworked and overwhelmed with stress, Back-End Developer, Jinha, manifested as an Omega.
Jinha brews resentment for the leader of the Strategic Planning Team, Hyunjoon, and decides to open a savings account solely to save money to later hire a hitman.
But of course, bad luck comes in threes.
Now that his body is vulnerable to other’s pheromones, the only way to stabilize his body and its craving is with Hyunjoon’s refreshing pheromones.
But the only thing that Jinha can trust is Modern Medicine!
When seeking medical advice to somehow overcome his situation, the only prescription given to him as the safest method, is to have sex with someone that’s compatible and of the same gender.
Not only is Jinha feeling hopeless as he navigates through his hardship, but a stalker appears and attempts to shower him with his pheromones.
Finding himself with no other choice, Jinha asks Hyunjoon for help.

title.en: Boku no Tsuma wa Kanjou ga Nai

altTitles.ja: 僕の妻は感情がない

description.en: A story about the humble marriage of a corporate slave salaryman and a housework robot.

title.en: Shy na Ano Ko ni Natsukaretai

altTitles.ja: シャイなあの子に懐かれたい

altTitles.en: I Want To Be Liked By That Shy Girl

altTitles.ja: ひとりと話すので精一杯

description.en:
What happens when a good-for-nothing human prince signs a contract with an all-powerful Demon King? Well, the prince dies instantly, and the Demon King is forced to take his place. But wait, there’s another catch! As the new Prince Lagier, the Demon King is obligated to fulfill the prince’s last wishes or never return to his former body. Join the Demon King and his demon friends as he gets in shape, battles the Angels, and races against time to complete his missions before it's too late.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lBj56CRxNQ0)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%9D%BC%EC%A7%80%EC%97%90%EB%A5%B4%EC%9D%98-%EC%84%9C/2507)
description.fr:
Le grand Roi Démon, Embilden, a été le premier à unifier le monde des démons. Un jour, un humain a osé invoquer le Roi Démon. C’était l’avide et le gros, le Prince Lagier Lou Jerlayla Rodwill ! Cependant, en invoquant le Roi Démon, il a fait une erreur dans le processus, ce qui a causé sa mort. Le corps de Lagier est gelé de force à cause du contrat qu’il avait passé avec le Roi Démon…

« Eh bien, je pourrais tout aussi bien exaucer son souhait ». Le Roi Démon décide de devenir Lagier et d’exaucer le vœu que le Prince avait avant de mourir gelé.
Jusqu’au jour où le royaume de Jerlayla règne sur le monde avec une puissance inégalée par quiconque !
C’est le début d’une nouvelle légende…… !
« Je devrais commencer par perdre du poids ».
… Je dois d’abord faire un régime.
description.ko:
사상최초로 마계를 통일한 위대한 마왕 '엠빌던'.
제르에이라 왕국 유일의 후계자인 성격파탄자 라지에르에게 빙의되었다?!

역대 최강이라 불리는 113대 마왕 엠빌던은 어느 날 한 인간에게 소환된다.
하지만 소환자인 망나니 뚱보 왕자 '라지에르 루 제르에이라 로드윌'은 소환과 동시에 그대로 사망해 버렸고
결국 계약대행 의무에 의해 엠빌던은 라지에르의 몸에 강제로 빙의되고 마는데...


탐욕스러운 라지에르가 바란 소원은 두 가지.

첫째, 자신에게 그 누구보다 강한 힘을.
둘째, 제르에이라가 세상을 지배할 수 있도록 할 것.


마계로 돌아가기 위해 어쩔 수 없이 라지에르의 생전의 소원을 들어주기로 한 엠빌던.
라지에르가 되어 그 누구보다 강한 힘으로 제르에이라 왕국이 세상을 지배하게 되는 새로운 전설의 시작이......!


"살부터 빼야겠네."

...일단 다이어트부터 시작이다.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lBj56CRxNQ0)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%9D%BC%EC%A7%80%EC%97%90%EB%A5%B4%EC%9D%98-%EC%84%9C/2507)
description.ru:
Как-то раз принцу Лазьеру в руки попал гримуар призыва демонических существ. Недолго думая, он воззвал к демону, прося наделить его великой силой и сделать повелителем мира. Вот только принц был слаб телом и духом, оттого не сумел выдержать мощи существа, вселившегося в него, ведь был то не простой демон, а сам 113-й король Эмбильдон, прославившийся тем, что объединил мир демонов.
Будучи контрактником, Эмбильдон не имеет права покинуть тело призывателя, пока не исполнит его желания. Но прежде чем повести «своё» королевство к мировому господству, ему придётся придумать, как поскорее разобраться с мешающим лишним весом оплывшего принца.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lBj56CRxNQ0)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%9D%BC%EC%A7%80%EC%97%90%EB%A5%B4%EC%9D%98-%EC%84%9C/2507)

altTitles.ja: ダンス・ダンス・ダンスール

description.en:
Junpei is happily snoozing away during his sister's ballet recital when a male ballet dancer steps onto the stage. Moved by the strength and skills the dancer displays, the boy discovers his love for this art.  
  
But after a certain tragedy happens, he vows to leave his past behind and turn into the epitome of manliness. What will he do when his love for ballet reignites?!

altTitles.ja: ウシハル

description.en: The cow Ushiharu was brought to the middle schooler Kiyoharu's farm. To the people around him, she appears as just a normal cow, but just to him, she appears as a sexy cow-girl…!?
description.ru: Корову Усихару привезли на ферму старшеклассника Киёхару. Для окружающих она выглядит как обычная корова, но только для него она выглядит как сексуальная корова!?
description.vi: Một con bò sữa được mang về trang trại của cậu học sinh Kiyoharu. Xung quanh cậu, ai cũng thấy đó chỉ là một con bò bình thường, nhưng chỉ riêng Kiyoharu thì đó không còn là một con bò nữa rồi...

altTitles.ja: 恋は双子で割り切れない

description.en: My family moved next door to the Jinguji family when I was six years old. From then until I was in the first grade of high school now, both parents were on good terms, and the twin sisters of the Jinguji family that I grew up with were my close friends as if they were like my own family. Ryumi, the sister who looks like a boy, and Naori, the otaku sister who is cute on the outside. And I'm Jun Shirasaki, who isn't afraid of being sandwiched between beautiful sisters with different personalities. Although I'm a novice in love, I don't have a special relationship and the changes continue. "Why don't you go out with me? How about we try dating?" These words from Ryumi eventually led us into a strange love triangle. The romantic comedy story of first love with twins begins!
description.id:
Keluargaku pindah ke sebelah keluarga Jinguji saat aku berusia enam tahun. Sejak saat itu sampai aku kelas satu SMA sekarang, kedua orang tua berhubungan baik, dan Saudari kembar keluarga jinguji yang tumbuh bersamaku merupakan teman dekatku seolah-olah mereka sudah seperti keluargaku sendiri.

Ryumi, saudari perempuan yang berpenampilan seperti laki-laki, dan Naori, saudari otaku yang memiliki sifat imut di luar. Dan Aku Jun Shirasaki, yang tidak takut terjepit di antara saudari perempuan cantik dengan kepribadian yang berbeda. Meskipun aku pemula dalma cinta, aku tak memiliki hubungan khusus dan perubahan terus berlanjut.

“Kenapa kau tidak pacaran denganku? Bagaimana kalau kita coba pacaran?”

Kata-Kata dari Ryumi ini akhirnya membawa kami ke cinta segitiga yang aneh.

Kisah komedi romantis cinta pertama dengan si kembar dimulai!

description.en: The hottest and most popular model on SNS these days, Choi Bom. Born with a good-looking appearance, he accidentally became a trend, posting a job offer for a housekeeper on his SNS. And after a while, a man comes to visit saying that he will work as a housekeeper... His best friend and first love, who disappeared 7 years ago ...

altTitles.ja: 約束のネバーランド

description.en:
At Grace Field House, life couldn't be better for the orphans! Though they have no parents, together with the other kids and a kind "Mama" who cares for them, they form one big, happy family. No child is ever overlooked, especially since they are all adopted by the age of 12. Their daily lives involve rigorous tests, but afterwards, they are allowed to play outside.   
  
There is only one rule they must obey: do not leave the orphanage. But one day, two top-scoring orphans, Emma and Norman, venture past the gate and unearth the horrifying reality behind their entire existence: they are all livestock, and their orphanage is a farm to cultivate food for a mysterious race of demons. With only a few months left to pull off an escape plan, the children must somehow change their predetermined fate.  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Promised Neverland** (2019)
description.pt:
Na “Casa de Grace Field” habitam 38 crianças órfãs.
Vivem felizes com a sua cuidadora, Isabella, a quem as crianças tratam como mãe. Mas certo dia, Emma e Norman descobrem que a Casa de Grace Field é afinal uma “quinta” cujo objetivo é criar alimento para monstros.
As remessas de crianças enviadas são escolhidas pela sua inteligência e desempenho em testes, que servem para tornar os seus cérebros… mais saborosos!
Não querendo perder mais nenhum membro da sua família, Norman e Emma começam a reunir informação vital para a sua sobrevivência e planeiam a sua fuga do orfanato.
description.ru:
Эмма и её друзья вели вполне счастливую сиротскую жизнь в приюте. Да, там жёсткие правила, но зато смотритель добрый. Вот только почему детям запрещено приближаться к воротам и забору?.. Иногда не известно, стоит ли узнавать правду, которая полностью переворачивает всю твою жизнь.  
  
- Won the 63rd Shogakukan Manga Awards in 2018 in the best shounen category.
  


---

**Links:]**   
- [Demizu's Twitter](https://twitter.com/DemizuPosuka)   
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=21552)  
- [Anime Season 2 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23263)
description.pt-br: Emma, Norman e Ray são as crianças mais brilhantes do orfanato Grace Field House. E, sob os cuidados da mulher a que se referem como “mamãe”, todas as crianças tiveram uma vida confortável. Boa comida, roupas limpas e o ambiente perfeito para aprender - o que mais um órfão poderia querer? Um dia, porém, Emma e Norman descobrem a verdade sombria do mundo exterior que eles estão proibidos de ver.

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
  
---

**Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]

altTitles.ja: お嬢と番犬くん

description.en: Senagaki Isaku will be a first year high school student starting in spring. Her grandfather is the third head of the Senagaki group, a yakuza organization, so she is feared by those around her. However, starting from spring, she hopes to make normal friends and normally fall in love. She is admitted into a high school further from her hometown, however, the overprotective young head of the Senagaki group, Utou Keiya, (26 years old) falsifies his age and enters the school with her through a backdoor admission…?! Keiya proclaims that love is too early for her although Isaku is perfectly ready. In truth, she has held an unrequited love for Keiya for quite some time.
description.pt-br: Senagaki Isaku, é uma estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio e neta do chefe da família Senagaki, um grupo de Yakuzas. Por isso, sempre teve medo de tudo ao seu redor, mas a partir de agora quer poder ter amigos e se apaixonar por pessoas normais. Para isso, Isaku-Chan decide ir estudar em uma escola longe de sua cidade, sem contar que o super protetor Utou Keiya (jovem de 26 anos, integrante do grupo gangster) não tem intenção de deixar nenhum menino se aproximar e vai atrás dela, entrando na mesma escola mentindo sobre sua idade. E assim a história de amor começa!

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.ja-ro: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

description.en: Jace, an Academic Honours student, once had a very bright future! However, his life has gone downhill ever since he punched a noble classmate. When he finally manages to get a chance to work as a private tutor… The duke is so handsome that he cannot concentrate!

altTitles.ja: 異世界薬局

altTitles.th: เภสัชกรเทพสองโลก

description.en:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
description.pt-br: Um jovem farmacêutico e pesquisador no Japão morreu de trabalho excessivo e foi reencarnado em uma Europa Paralela Medieval. Ele foi reencarnado como um aprendiz de 10 anos para um famoso farmacêutico da Royal Court, tinha alcançado habilidades desumanas de habilidade para ver a doença, a criação material e a destruição material. Em uma sociedade em que a prática médica duvidosa é desenfreada, o aumento dos preços através do monopólio da aliança farmacêutica e uma boa medicina não estão disponíveis para os plebeus. Ele foi reconhecido pelo imperador naquele momento e abriu uma farmácia na esquina da cidade. Ele eliminará a fraude que varreu o mundo e entregará aos plebeus um medicamento verdadeiramente eficaz que foi desenvolvido usando a farmacologia atual. Assim, o menino farmacêutico enganará usando seu conhecimento prévio para criar medicamentos inovadores, ajudando as pessoas do mundo paralelo, uma história sobre como viver sua nova vida ao máximo desta vez. A popular web novel agora vem em forma de manga!

altTitles.ja: 魔人探偵脳噛ネウロ

description.en: The Demon Neuro has a raging hunger for ‘mysteries.’ Being dissatisfied with his current regime in hell, he’s come into the mortal realm in order to satiate his ever-growing appetite. The murder case of a young girl’s father seems to be sufficiently enticing for the Demon’s needs.. But what else might happen between these two? Find out in this disturbingly good murder-mystery series.

altTitles.ja: 魔人探偵脳噛ネウロ

description.en: The Demon Neuro has a raging hunger for ‘mysteries.’ Being dissatisfied with his current regime in hell, he’s come into the mortal realm in order to satiate his ever-growing appetite. The murder case of a young girl’s father seems to be sufficiently enticing for the Demon’s needs.. But what else might happen between these two? Find out in this disturbingly good murder-mystery series.

A hidden love story of a ghost princess who never loved anyone. General Jahyeon of Heeran Nation marries Soru, a ‘princess who sees ghosts’ by the king’s order. Jahyeon is cold to Soru, but he has the power to ward off ghosts, hence Soru wants to stay by his side. Soru is willing to sacrifice everything for Jahyeon, who is her only safe haven. Jahyeon is getting more and more concerned about Soru, but…
description.uk: Таємнича історія кохання принцеси-привида, яка ніколи нікого не любила. Генерал Джа Хьон з нації Хіран одружується із Со Ру, «принцесою, яка бачить привидів», за наказом короля. Джа Хьон холодно ставиться до Со Ру, але якимсь чином він відлякує привидів, тому вона хоче залишитися з ним. Со Ру готова пожертвувати всім заради Джа Хьона, який здатен дати їй відчуття безпеки. Він дедалі більше непокоїться за принцесу, але...

altTitles.ja: オオカミだけど傷つけません

altTitles.en: I'm a Wolf, but I Won't Harm You

altTitles.zh: 虽然是狼，但不会伤害你

description.en:
Lucy Leopardi has no friends. But of course she doesn’t—she’s a lamb born into a family of lions! Lonely, insecure, and desperate for friendship, Lucy can’t wait to make her first friend. One fateful night on a ballroom balcony, she meets Roman, a charming, young dog with whom she makes an instant connection. But when his association with the infamous House of Baskerville comes to light, will their newfound friendship blossom, or will dishonesty bite into their budding relationship?

---
- [Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>](https://ridibooks.com/books/372007073)

- [Original Webtoon <Comico>](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1177)

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57375032)

- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6335121)

description.ja:
獅子の血族であり、政治の名門として有名なレオパルディ家から羊が生まれた！？ 肉食動物の間で心の拠り所を見つけられず、ひとりぼっちで生きてきた羊のルーシー。 ある日、社交パーティーで煌く銀髪と大きい耳のローマンに出会う。羊だという事実にも関わらず彼女に心を寄せるローマンにルーシーは心を開き始めるが、ローマンには秘密があった… 雑食動物の犬であると言っていたローマンは、実は肉食動物のオオカミだったのだ！結ばれない自分たちの運命を変えようとする二人のラブストーリー！

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/80822)
description.ko:
사자 혈족이자 정치 명문으로 유명한 레오파르디 가문에서 양이 태어났다고?!

‘루시, 8대조 할머니께서 양이셨단다….’

육식 동물 혈족 사이에서 마음 둘 곳 없이 외롭게 살아가던 루시.
평소처럼 파티에서 홀로 놀던 그녀에게 반짝이는 은발 사이로 귀가 쫑긋 솟은 로만이 다가온다.

그러던 어느 날, 로만의 비밀이 루시에게 커다란 배신감을 안기는데!

“야, 너 개라며?! 개라며!”
이루어질 수 없는 운명의 둘은 과연 맺어질 수 있을까?

---
- [Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>](https://ridibooks.com/books/372007073)

- [Original Webtoon <Comico>](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1177)

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57375032)

- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6335121)

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30675)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/80822)
description.zh:
以政治名门享有声望的狮子家族居然诞下了一只羊?!“露西，第八代祖母其实也是只羊…”在肉食血族中孤独生活的露西，有一天一如既往在派对上也是形单影只的她，突然有一位竖着耳朵的银发男子罗蒙向她走来，就这样她们彼此吸引，彼此欣赏，并且成为了亲密朋友。然而有一天露西发现了他的秘密，“你不是说你是犬类吗？！怎么是只狼！” 两人的命运究竟会如何呢？

---

altTitles.ja: フツウーの恋って何？
フツーの恋って何？

description.en:
**Is my "red string of fate" connected to you?**

The high school first year "me" that fell in love at first sight at the school entrance ceremony. But that love was not normal...
A yuri story depicted from the point of view of three high school girls.
description.ja:
**私の赤い“糸”はあなたと繋がってますか？**

高校一年生の入学式に一目惚れしてしまった「わたし」。でもその恋は普通ではなかった…。
３人の女子高生の視点で描かれた百合物語。

title.en: Henkyou no Mahou Kusushi - Jiyuu Kimama na Isekai Mono Zukuri Nikki

altTitles.ja: 辺境の魔法薬師 〜自由気ままな異世界ものづくり日記〜

description.en:
Me, who has mastered the game profession of "magic medicine doctor," was reborn in a miserable world where the only medicine available was a grotesque recovery potion!
Reincarnate as a child of a noble family and save the world by secretly improving magic potions. If you create not only medicines but also various other things, you may be thanked by your cute little sister and everyone in the territory!

altTitles.ja: はるかリセット

description.en: Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

altTitles.ja: ミカるんX

description.en:
Somebody wants the Earth! After being invaded for 6 times by monsters and aliens, Tokyo was damaged and almost destroyed. When Runna Minami meets an honor student, Mika Kujiraoka, the bishojo fighters of justice, Mikarun X, are born.  
They transform themselves into giants and, without wearing anything, the two heroines fight against the various enemies.  


---

**Links**  
- [Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/r_tkt)

altTitles.ja: カナン様はあくまでチョロい

altTitles.vi: Ác quỷ Kanan dễ đối phó thật đấy

description.en:
Kanan is a demon hiding in a high school in the human world to feed on the souls of humans. She sets her sights on a single high school boy, but somehow ends up in a lovers contract with him!? Kanan, who has never been in love, is now filled with new feelings!

The romantic comedy of a pure-hearted demon's first love, begins!

(Source: Shounen Magazine, translated)
description.ja: 人間の魂を喰らうべく、人間界の高校に潜伏する女悪魔・カナン。一人の男子高校生に狙いを定めるが、気づけばなぜか恋人契約を結ぶことに！？ しかし恋なんてしたことのないカナンには、未知な感情ばかりで…！ 甘酸っぱい青春とギャグの嵐！！
description.tr: Kanan, ruhları sömürmek adına liseye sızan dişi bir iblis. Erkek bir öğrenciyi avı olarak seçer ancak... her nasıl oluyorsa ardından kız arkadaşı olmayı kabul eder!? Daha önce aşkı hiç tatmamış olan Kanan, bilinmedik duygularla dolup taşıyor! Saf kalpli iblisimizin ilk aşkını anlatan sevimli romantik komedi başlıyor!
description.vi: Kanan là một con quỷ ẩn náu trong một trường trung học ở thế giới loài người để ăn linh hồn của con người. Cô ấy để ý đến một nam sinh trung học duy nhất, nhưng bằng cách nào đó lại kết thúc với một hợp đồng tình nhân với anh ta !? Kanan, người chưa từng yêu, giờ đang tràn ngập cảm xúc mới! Bộ truyện hài lãng mạn về mối tình đầu của một con quỷ có trái tim thuần khiết, bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Kanan é uma demônio que se esconde em uma escola secundária no mundo humano para se alimentar de almas humanas. Ela põe em sua mira em um dos alunos da escola mas de alguma forma acaba assinando um contrato de amante com ele! Mas Kanan que nunca esteve apaixonada antes, está cheia de emoções desconhecidas…! Começa uma comédia romântica do primeiro amor de uma Demônio!

altTitles.ja: 双星の陰陽師

description.en:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
description.ru: С давних времён доблестные оммёдзи сражаются со скверной - злобными духами, рождёнными из человеческих страхов, боли и отчаяния. Рокуро с детства мечтал стать сильнейшим оммёдзи и очистить мир от скверны, но ужасная трагедия на долгие годы убила в нём всякое желание бороться. Но кому есть дело до желаний гиперактивного мальчишки, когда от него и талантливой девочки зависит судьба всего мира?
description.tr: Rokuro Enmado, kötü Kegare'yi ortadan kaldıran bir şeytan kovucu ailesindendir, ancak asıl hayali bir şarkıcı, futbolcu ya da şeytan kovucudan başka bir şey olmaktır. Benio Adashino adında başka bir şeytan çıkarıcı kız geldiğinde, Rokura aniden rekabetçi bir ruhla alevlenir ve doğal yeteneğini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. İkisi de kaderlerinde evlenip dünyadaki tüm Kegare'leri ortadan kaldıracak kehanet çocuğunu yaratmak olan iki nihai savaşçı, "İkiz Yıldız Şeytan Kovucu" olduklarını öğrendiklerinde rekabetleri daha da karmaşık bir hal alır.
description.pt-br: Rokuro sonha em se tornar tudo menos um exorcista! Então a misteriosa Benio aparece. Os dois são apelidados de "Exorcistas das Estrelas Gêmeas" e descobrem que estão destinados a se casar... Rokuro pode escapar de ambos os destinos? Quando o melhor amigo de Rokuro, Ryogo, desaparece, Rokuro é forçado a pedir ajuda a Benio para entrar em Magano, o reino dos Kegare, para resgatá-lo!

title.en: Yankii Haiyuu, Ecchi na Engi Shidou Saretemasu.

altTitles.ja: 演ってもヤるとは言ってねぇ!
ヤンキー俳優、えっちな演技指導されてます。

altTitles.en: I'll Act, But I Never Said I'd Do That!

altTitles.ja-ro: Yatte mo Yaru to wa Itte nee!

description.en: "I'll help you with your 'special training'!" Aspiring actor, Tetsu, spends day after day auditioning for roles, but is turned down due to his delinquent personality, leaving him with little choice but to lodge with his long time friend, Satoshi, who is a popular scriptwriter. Finally, a shot at a lead role presents itself to a disparaged Tetsu, but the offer turns out to be for a "man on man romance" movie. Being attracted to men himself, Satoshi offers Tetsu his guidance to help him get into character, but ends up getting jeered at... Clearly irritated, Satoshi says, "Fine. I'll help you out as an 'experiment'. Why don't we give it a try?" And with that, the two friends cross a line they never thought they would... all because of a movie! A cool-headed, popular writer meets an idiotic delinquent actor in this heart-pounding sensual story!
description.fr: "Je vais t'aider avec ton 'entraînement spécial'!" L'acteur en herbe, Tetsu, passe jour après jour à auditionner pour des rôles, mais est refusé en raison de sa personnalité délinquante, ne lui laissant d'autre choix que de loger chez son ami de longue date, Satoshi, qui est un scénariste populaire. Finalement, une chance pour un rôle principal se présente à Tetsu, mais l'offre s'avère être celle d'un film de "romance BL". Étant lui-même attiré par les hommes, Satoshi propose à Tetsu ses conseils pour l'aider à entrer dans le personnage, mais finit par se moquer ... Clairement irrité, Satoshi dit : "Très bien. Je vais t'aider à titre d'"expérience". Pourquoi ne pas le faire ? " on ne va pas essayer ?" Et avec ça, les deux amis franchissent une ligne qu’ils n’auraient jamais pensé franchir… tout cela à cause d’un film ! Un écrivain populaire et calme rencontre un acteur délinquant idiot dans cette histoire sensuelle et palpitante !

title.en: Osananajimi to wa Romcom ni Naranai

altTitles.en: No More Love With the Girls.

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染とはラブコメにならない

altTitles.ja-ro: Osananajimi to wa Love Comedy ni Naranai

altTitles.th: ไม่มีทางที่มันจะกลายเป็นเลิฟคอมเมดี้กับยัยเพื่อนสมัยเด็กหรอก

altTitles.zh-hk: 和青梅竹馬之間不會有戀愛喜劇

altTitles.ar: لا مزيد من الحب مع الفتيات.

altTitles.vi: Làm Gì Có Chuyện Tình Hài Hước Giữa Bạn Thuở Nhỏ Được!

description.en: The high school boy Eiyuu has a problem! His two childhood friends (♀) who go to the same school as him, Shio and Akari, are too cute! Even though they have no interest in him, he looks at their grown-up selves with sexual interest. If they were to find out… it would be utterly embarrassing! Meanwhile, his two childhood friends also have secrets of their own...!? It's irritating! It's complicated!! But childhood friends are the best!!! A sweet and irritating love triangle romcom ♡ where you can't be honest!
description.ja: 高校生男子・えーゆーの悩み。それは、二人の幼馴染「しお」と「あかり」が可愛すぎること! 向こうにその気はないのに、俺だけがオトナになった二人をエッチな目で見てるなんてバレたら…ハズすぎる! 一方、実は二人もえーゆーのことが…!? ヒロイン全員、幼馴染!! じれったい! ややこしい!! けど幼馴染って超最高っ!!!
description.th: เอยู (A.U.) หนุ่มมอปลายที่กำลังพบปัญหาใหญ่! ปัญหานั่นก็คือเพื่อนสมัยเด็กทั้งสองคน "ชิโอ" และ "อาการิ" ที่อยู่โรงเรียนเดียวกันนั้นน่ารักเกินต้าน! ถ้าหากทั้งสองรู้ว่าเขาได้มองพวกเธอที่เติบโตขึ้นมาอย่างสมส่วนด้วยสายตาลามก (ถึงแม้จะไม่ได้ตั้งใจ) ล่ะก็มีหวังแย่แน่! ในทางกลับกัน เพื่อนสมัยเด็กทั้งสองคนนั้นเองก็มีความลับของตนเอง...!? ทั้งหยอกเย้า! ทั้งทำให้สับสน!! ถึงจะอย่างนั้นเพื่อนสมัยเด็กนี่แหละยอดที่สุด!!! เลิฟคอมเมดี้รักสามเส้าแสนหวานที่พูดตรง ๆ ไม่ได้♡
